docs.snippet: This spring, trench coats make way for the new outerwear of choice....

docs.abstract: This spring, trench coats make way for the new outerwear of choice.

docs.snippet: Eva Marie Saint has a perfect right to act like Hollywood royalty....

headline.main: Eva Marie Saint Dishes on Hollywood in TCM Special
headline.print_headline: Eva Marie Saint Dishes on Hollywood in TCM Special

docs.lead_paragraph: Eva Marie Saint has a perfect right to act like Hollywood royalty.

docs.snippet: Giuseppe Recchi, the frontrunner to become chairman of Telecom Italia, said Italy's largest telecoms group by market value must act as a true public company and as chairman he would represent all shareholders equally....

headline.main: Chairman Candidate Says Telecom Italia Must Act as True Public Company
headline.print_headline: Chairman Candidate Says Telecom Italia Must Act as True Public Company

docs.lead_paragraph: Giuseppe Recchi, the frontrunner to become chairman of Telecom Italia, said Italy's largest telecoms group by market value must act as a true public company and as chairman he would represent all shareholders equally.

docs.snippet: The London Metal Exchange (LME) pressed on with reforms to its warehousing network on Friday, unveiling tighter "Chinese Wall" restrictions a day after a court ruling forced the LME to halt a plan to cut delivery backlogs....

headline.main: LME Tightens 'Chinese Wall' Rules on Warehouses, Traders
headline.print_headline: LME Tightens 'Chinese Wall' Rules on Warehouses, Traders

docs.lead_paragraph: The London Metal Exchange (LME) pressed on with reforms to its warehousing network on Friday, unveiling tighter "Chinese Wall" restrictions a day after a court ruling forced the LME to halt a plan to cut delivery backlogs.

docs.snippet: Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho has again criticised referee Chris Foy, despite facing a charge of improper conduct by the FA following his comments about the official after the 1-0 defeat at Aston Villa earlier this month....

headline.main: Mourinho Hits Out Again at Referee Foy
headline.print_headline: Mourinho Hits Out Again at Referee Foy

docs.lead_paragraph: Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho has again criticised referee Chris Foy, despite facing a charge of improper conduct by the FA following his comments about the official after the 1-0 defeat at Aston Villa earlier this month.

docs.snippet: Italy said on Friday it will back cuts of at least 25 percent to top managers' salaries at oil producer Eni, utility Enel and defense contractor Finmeccanica at coming shareholders' meetings....

headline.main: Italy to Seek Pay Cut for Eni, Enel, Finmeccanica Managers
headline.print_headline: Italy to Seek Pay Cut for Eni, Enel, Finmeccanica Managers

docs.lead_paragraph: Italy said on Friday it will back cuts of at least 25 percent to top managers' salaries at oil producer Eni, utility Enel and defense contractor Finmeccanica at coming shareholders' meetings.

docs.snippet: Local elections in Turkey could prove a critical turning point in Prime Minister Erdogan's battle to survive a growing scandal over corruption and state control of the media.  Ivor Bennett reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Local elections in Turkey could prove a critical turning point in Prime Minister Erdogan's battle to survive a growing scandal over corruption and state control of the media.  Ivor Bennett reports.

docs.snippet: The St. Louis Cardinals now own their top minor-league team....

headline.main: Cardinals Close Deal to Buy Triple-A Memphis Team
headline.print_headline: Cardinals Close Deal to Buy Triple-A Memphis Team

docs.lead_paragraph: The St. Louis Cardinals now own their top minor-league team.

docs.snippet: Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone is thinking about nothing else apart from four basic tasks as the La Liga leaders prepare for their remaining eight matches of the campaign, the Argentine said on Friday....

headline.main: Eat, Rest, Travel, Play-Atletico's Season-End Focus
headline.print_headline: Eat, Rest, Travel, Play-Atletico's Season-End Focus

docs.lead_paragraph: Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone is thinking about nothing else apart from four basic tasks as the La Liga leaders prepare for their remaining eight matches of the campaign, the Argentine said on Friday.

docs.snippet: Turkey's main opposition party has barely dented support for Prime Minister Tayyip Erdogan despite months of anti-government protests, an investigation into government graft and hours of incriminating conversations leaked online....

headline.main: Turkish Opposition Struggles to Close Gap With Scandal-Hit Erdogan
headline.print_headline: Turkish Opposition Struggles to Close Gap With Scandal-Hit Erdogan

docs.lead_paragraph: Turkey's main opposition party has barely dented support for Prime Minister Tayyip Erdogan despite months of anti-government protests, an investigation into government graft and hours of incriminating conversations leaked online.
